mapper.select: SELECT employeeNo , employeeName , employeePassWord , employeePhoneNumber , employeePostcode , employeeCommonaddress , employeeDetailaddress , employeeCompanyPhoneNumber , employeeEmail , employeeJoinDate , employeeRegisterDate , employeeModifyDate FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE employeeNo = #{employeeNo} AND employeePassWord = #{employeePassWord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OVERTIMEOFEMPLOYEE( employeeNo, sumOfOverTime, extensionOverTime, nightTimeOvertime, holidayOvertimeOfExceed8Hours, holidayOvertimeOfNotExceed8Hours ) VALUES ( #{employeeNo}, "0", "0", "0", "0", "0" )
mapper.select: SELECT o.acceptNo , o.drafter , (select employeeName from employee where employeeNo = o.drafter) as drafterName , o.draftDate , o.approvalRequestDate , o.approvalLine , (select employeeName from employee where employeeNo = o.approvalLine) as approvalLineName , o.approvalDescription , m.codeName FROM OVERTIMEAPPROVAL o JOIN MASTERTABLE m ON o.approvalDescription = m.codeValue WHERE o.approvalLine = #{employeeNo} AND o.approvalDate is null AND NOT o.approvalDescription = "overTimeApprovalA1"

SELECT o.acceptNo , o.drafter , e.employeeName , o.draftDate , o.approvalRequestDate , o.approvalLine , o.approvalDescription , m.codeName FROM OVERTIMEAPPROVAL o JOIN EMPLOYEE e JOIN MASTERTABLE m ON o.drafter = e.employeeNo AND o.approvalDescription = m.codeValue WHERE o.acceptNo = #{acceptNo} AND o.approvalDate is null;

SELECT o.acceptNo , o.drafter , (select employeeName from employee where employeeNo = o.drafter) as drafterName , o.draftDate , o.approvalRequestDate , o.approvalLine , (select employeeName from employee where employeeNo = o.approvalLine) as approvalLineName , o.approvalDescription , m.codeName , o.approvalDate , o.approvalLineConfirm , (select employeeName from employee where employeeNo = o.approvalLineConfirm) as approvalLineConfirmName FROM OVERTIMEAPPROVAL o JOIN MASTERTABLE m ON o.approvalDescription = m.codeValue WHERE o.approvalLineConfirm = #{employeeNo} AND o.approvalDate is NOT NULL
SELECT employeeNo , sumOfOverTime FROM OVERTIMEOFEMPLOYEE WHERE employeeNo = #{employeeNo};

SELECT o.acceptNo , o.drafter , (select employeeName from employee where employeeNo = o.drafter) as drafterName , o.draftDate , o.approvalRequestDate , o.approvalLine , (select employeeName from employee where employeeNo = o.approvalLine) as approvalLineName , o.approvalDescription , m.codeName , o.approvalDate , o.approvalLineConfirm , (select employeeName from employee where employeeNo = o.approvalLineConfirm) as approvalLineConfirmName FROM OVERTIMEAPPROVAL o JOIN MASTERTABLE m JOIN MEASURER me ON o.approvalDescription = m.codeValue AND o.acceptNo=me.acceptNo WHERE o.approvalDescription = "overTimeApprovalD0" AND o.approvalDate is NOT NULL AND me.measurer = #{employeeNo}

SELECT o.acceptNo , o.drafter , (select employeeName from employee where employeeNo = o.drafter) as drafterName , o.draftDate , o.approvalRequestDate , o.approvalLine , (select employeeName from employee where employeeNo = o.approvalLine) as approvalLineName , o.approvalDescription , m.codeName , o.approvalDate , o.approvalLineConfirm , (select employeeName from employee where employeeNo = o.approvalLineConfirm) as approvalLineConfirmName FROM OVERTIMEAPPROVAL o JOIN MASTERTABLE m JOIN MEASURER me ON o.approvalDescription = m.codeValue AND o.acceptNo=me.acceptNo WHERE o.approvalDescription = "overTimeApprovalA1" AND o.approvalDate is NULL AND me.measurer = #{employeeNo}
SELECT measurer FROM MEASURER WHERE acceptNo = #{acceptNo}
SELECT employeeNo, roleCode FROM authority WHERE employeeNo=#{employeeNo} AND roleCode="RequestOfOverTime"
SELECT employeeNo, roleCode FROM authority WHERE employeeNo=#{employeeNo} AND roleCode="EmployeeRegist"
